cells.data:
-- Applied to a predicate and a list, 
-- |any| returns true if at least one element of the 
-- list satisfies the predicate.

-- any :: (a -> Bool) -> [a] -> Bool
on |any|(f, xs)
    tell mReturn(f)
        set lng to length of xs
        repeat with i from 1 to lng
            if |Î»|(item i of xs) then return true
        end repeat
        false
    end tell
end |any|
